nodes.text: A clone trooper who served under Lieutenant Trap in Tango Company as part of the Pelta-class frigate TB-73's crew during the Clone Wars.

Shortly after the Second Battle of Geonosis, this clone trooper was aboard the Pelta-class frigate TB-73 commanded by Jedi Commanders Ahsoka Tano and Barriss Offee during a medical supply run to a station near Ord Cestus.

Unbeknownst to him, Geonosian brain worms had been brought aboard the ship by clone trooper CT-9544, and these worms soon infected the entire crew save the Jedi. He was the final uninfected clone left on the ship, falling victim to the parasites when the other possessed troopers trapped him in a cargo room. The clones Scythe and Edge pinned him down, while Havoc took one of the brain worms and infected him, a scene witnessed by the horrified Ahsoka and Barriss. Later, after Ahsoka discovered that the worms could be killed by frost, she ruptured the ship's cooling tanks, curing this clone trooper and the rest of the crew.
